thread.section_title: Jomashop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jomashop | www.jomashop.com | 6 of 259
thread.title: Michael Kurtz

author: Michael Kurtz
title: Michael Kurtz
text:
really about the best i've come across. lowest prices anywhere on the several watches i've gotten from seiko automatic divers to the high end oris diver 65 auto diver i just bought. the watches are brand new pristine NOT try-ons or returns, with all plastic and tags. they provide their own warranty vs. manufacturers, but no removed serial numbers or anything like that. and from what i've heard, their warranty work is not only excellent but quicker than manufacturers...tho all my purchases have been perfect and needed no other attention except a bit thank you.
note, i ordered a few watches that i had to cancel the next day because of something i hadn't been aware of, like it had a screwdown crown and i didn't want that, or visa versa...my fault totally for not fully reading specs on the watches...the cancellations were handled flawlessly and in a very friendly manner. i've been purchasing watches, including very high end, and i'd really say these guys are about the best.
